string.value: I completed making #b#t4031451##k but there's no use. I'll have to ask #b#p2020005##k to find out how to give magic powers to the summoned-being so it becomes my familiar.

As I showed him the completed summoned-being's frame #b#p2020005##k said all that's left is to get the Spiritual Stone, which will ignite its' power. He said I would be able to find the stone in another world and that #b#p2041023##k would know how to get there.\r\n#i4031470##t4031470# #b#c4031470#/1

Right! That's the way! I should find the #belement based spiritual stone#k! If you soak the element-based magic mixture into a normal summon, it won't work as your power conflicts with the summon's. If the spirit of summon is an element-based magic, it will spring back. That means it will be stronger. Fantastic!
Get #b#t4031470##k. The spiritual stone of an ice element will be the best.
Very good. #b#t4031470##k can be found in a different world. There's a door to the different world deep inside of Ludibrium. The Magician #b#p2041023##k will know how to open it. Ask him about it!
Hmm? Does this theory miss something? If there isn't a better theory, this is the best way to go about getting what you want!
Oh! You have #b#t4031470##k. Now you only have to give me the power of spiritual stone to #b#t4031451##k. Aren't you excited? I'll make your summon right away!
Now you can use #rElquines#k, the ice familiar. How do you feel going beyond basic element-based magic? You've opened a new chapter in the history of the Maple World!.
Hope you pave new ways for Magical Study with your adventures!
If you have #b#t4031470##k, I can make summon. Go and get it.
